body:
Current develop:

```
time spack python -c 'spack.store.db.query("environment-modules target=x86_64")'
real	0m5.402s
```

With this PR:
```
time spack python -c 'spack.store.db.query("environment-modules target=x86_64")'
real	0m1.582s
```

Before #25986 

```
$ time spack python -c 'spack.store.db.query("environment-modules target=x86_64")'
real    0m1.576s
```
title: Fix spack.platforms.host() slowness
